entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 10:48 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
